remarks: A poset element less than or equal to an atom equals either zero or the atom.  ( ~ atss analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2011.)
statement:
leatom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
leatom.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
leatom.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
leatom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
leatb $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( X .<_ P <-> ( X = P \/ X = .0. ) ) ) $.
